name: Barbeque Nation
address: 3rd Floor,Triplex Mall, Gajpati Nagar Nalco chowk, Bhubaneswar
description: Behaviour, ambience, food quality, variety is extraordinary.

name: Nakli Dhaba
address: 8 - B Jayadev Vihar Behind Hotel Trident, Bhubaneswar
description: Awesome experience at the hotel.. thanks to the courteous and helpful staff from reception to room service.

name: Jungle View
address: Chandaka Nandankanan Road, Near Botanical Garden South Gate, Bhubaneswar
description: Went here for the famous Bamboo Mutton and I must say it was yummy.

name: Orchid
address: 86/A-1, Gautam Nagar Near Kalpana Square, Fortune Park Sisihmo, Bhubaneswar
description: Love this place a lot they serve a variety of cuisine. The seafood here is great and very fresh.
